page.title: 18LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: SPITTLE FARM The name "Spittle"appears in the "Place Names Of Devon"Part 2 by Gover,Mawer and Stenton which shows Spittle is LE HOSPITAL 1242 FEES SPITELE 1346 FA 1367 FA THE KNIGHTS HOSPITALLERS owned land in Chulmleigh at this time including the Hospitallers' Farm (later Spittle) The following either lived in or held the tenement of Spittle Farm in 13th.-15th. centuries. 1242 William De l'Ospital 1292 John Atherasleigh 1356 Walter de Waldron 1396 William Champernoun 1418 John Hurlee 1423 William Raysshleigh 1428 Katrina Handford Rating records show it to have been a most important farm in 1726
